examples.example: 妈妈为我准备了一床温暖又舒适的被子。

translate.english: Mother has prepared a warm and comfortable quilt for me.

examples.example: 我买了一床漂亮的棉被，它让我每晚都能睡个好觉。

translate.english: I bought a beautiful cotton quilt, and it enables me to have a good sleep every night.

examples.example: 我在商场精心挑选了一床柔软的毛毯，它给我的生活增添了许多温暖。

translate.english: I carefully selected a soft blanket in the mall, and it has added a lot of warmth to my life.
